article.title: DRS to Provide Movement Tracking System
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: DRS Tactical Systems Inc., Melbourne, Fla., was awarded a $38,038,700 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of the Movement Tracking System and related services. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, N.J., is the contracting activity.
